mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_no,id,product_no) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(cart_no),0) + 1 FROM cart),#{id},#{product_no})
mapper.update: update cart set purchase_amount=#{purchase_amount} where id=#{id} and product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where product_no=#{product_no} and id=#{id}
